name: create-electron-vue-next
description: Create electron-vue-next app scaffold from cli

scripts.build:dir: cross-env ELECTRON_VERSION=10.1.2 npm run build:dir --prefix electron-vue-next
scripts.build:lite: cross-env ELECTRON_VERSION=10.1.2 npm run build:lite --prefix electron-vue-next
scripts.build:production: cross-env ELECTRON_VERSION=10.1.2 npm run build:production --prefix electron-vue-next
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .ts,.vue,.js --config electron-vue-next/.eslintrc.js electron-vue-next/src electron-vue-next/scripts index.js scripts
